attributes.gcd: Refers to the date as on which the snapshot of source data extracted for processing.

Refers to the source system from where data is extracted. Data can be sourced from multiple sources, this column will Refers to the source code from where the data is extracted for this extraction date.

Flag indicates whether the given dimension value record has been disabled or expired. The list of values includes Y- Indicates that the dimension value has been disabled, N- Indicates that the dimension value is not disabled and is still active.
Refers to the code to be used for First Mortgage Loan Modification.
Refers to the code to be used for Home Equity Loan Modification.

Refers to the loan that is currently operating under modified terms and identifies the specific terms that were altered through loss mitigation efforts.
This field is independent of investor and speaks only to the nature of the program. For example, a FNMA loan may be modified under either a FDIC or proprietary modification program where in these cases this field would be populated with either the FDIC or proprietary codes while the Investor field would identify the modification as being performed on a FNMA loan.
0. Loan has not been modified 
6. ASF Streamline 
8. FHFA Streamline which is Specific to program announced on 12.15.08
9. FDIC Streamline which is Mod in a Box
10. Proprietary Systematic Program 
11. Proprietary Other 
12. Home Affordable Modification and
0. Not Modified
7. 2MP
8. Proprietary Systematic
9. Proprietary Other
10. HAMP.

attributes.logicalName: Loan Modification Type Regulatory Display Code
attributes.gcd: Refers to the display codes to be used in regulatory report submissions for Loan Modification Type.
Refers to the record creation date. It has been added to all catalog entities to enable partitioning and archival.
It Indicates if dimension record is seeded by product or not. The SCD component would not overwrite the record if it is set to 'Y'.
